message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product. I believe it holds significant value, and I'm willing to part with it for $14,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I understand its value, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is really my bottom line. I know this product is worth it - how about we meet in the middle at $12,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet at $12,000. I would like to propose $11,000 as a compromise.
